## AudioTrackProps interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface AudioTrackProps<T extends HTMLMediaElement = HTMLMediaElement> extends React.HTMLAttributes<T>
```

**Extends:** React.HTMLAttributes&lt;T&gt;
